h2_title: How to Find the Stone Monkey
content: Immediately, you'll see a giant staff in the center of the room. Make your way over to it and let the cutscene  out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Stone Monkey'.
The content is as follows:
Immediately, you'll see a giant staff in the center of the room. Make your way over to it and let the cutscene  out.
